channel.title: Degrassi: TNG Podcasts
channel.itunes:subtitle: Degrassi stars dish the dirt, talk about the show, and let you in on what they do when they're not making the best teen show ever!
channel.itunes:author: Epitome Pictures Inc.
channel.itunes:summary: Catch your favorite cast members from Degrassi: The Next Generation right here! Hear from the stars of television's most intense teen drama as they discuss everything from what it's like on-set, to what music they're listening to, to what movies theyre loving, to what style theyre rocking. Coming to you from the set of Degrassi, these Podcasts are your all-access pass to Degrassi Community School, and beyond!
channel.description: Catch your favorite cast members from Degrassi: The Next Generation right here@ Hear from the stars of television's most intense teen drama as they discuss everything from what it's like on-set, to what music they're listening to, to what movies theyre loving, to what style theyre rocking. Coming to you from the set of Degrassi, these Podcasts are your all-access pass to Degrassi Community School, and beyond!

item.title: Adamo Returns!
item.itunes:author: Adamo Returns!
item.description: There's a familiar face returning to Degrassi! In this podcast, find out how Adamo's first days on set were like and how his friendship with Shane and Aubrey got its rocky start.
item.itunes:subtitle: There's a familiar face returning to Degrassi! In this podcast, find out how Adamo's first days on set were like and how his friendship with Shane and Aubrey got its rocky start.

item.title: Daniel Clark and Mike Lobel - Degrassi's Bad Boys!
item.itunes:author: Epitome Pictures Inc.
item.description: Mike Lobel and Daniel Clark let you in on what they're watching, what they're listening to, and what they'll get up to before Season Seven of Degrassi starts shooting... along with the exclusive premiere of Mike Lobel's new solo music project!
